sub_title: L.L.M. candidate Tilburg University (International Business Taxation)
summary:
I'm a candidate for L.L.M. degree of Tilburg University 2022/2023 (International Business Taxation).
My previous education was gotten in Russia by graduating with a barchelor degree in International Law from the Russian Foreign Trade Academy.
English C1, French B1-B2, Russian fluent.
Current Dutch residence permit, living in Rotterdam.
After graduation I worked in the International software company Prosoft and in one of the leading Russian personal protective equipment producers Energocontract as a lawyer assistant.
I was in charge of keeping track on all the documentation of the company, keeping in contact with our clients, arranging meetings for my superiors, registered letters of procuration for company's employees and insurances for our clients. 
I am capable of leading a business correspondence, stress resistant and fast learner.
I am fluent with Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Outlook and other programs.

education.field_of_study: International Business, Trade, and Tax Law

profile_positions.description:
Corporate law
•	Registration of legal entities, as well as amendments to legislative documents and issue of valuable shares.
•	Synchronizing the work of maintaining registers of shareholders by third parties.
•	Forming the legal foundations of business bodies.
•	Providing advice to employees of the company on issues of a different nature in written and oral form.
•	Verifying whether the submitted signature of the head of various companies, projects, orders, instructions and other legal documents complies with the law, as well as carefully check the status of contractual work in the structural divisions of enterprises.
•	Developing and sending complaints against the actions of officials of state supervisory bodies.
•	Providing legal assistance in the preparation of legal documents.
•	Carrying out verification of the legality of the transfer of employees or their dismissal, as well as the imposition of disciplinary comments on them.
•	Registration of legally lawful and most beneficial for the employer under the terms of contracts with suppliers, customers, contractors, commission agents and other counterparties of the organization.
•	Advising management and other internal users on various issues regarding legal structures and information. Regulation of legal relations between the organization and its employees.
•	Representing the interests of the organization in case of settlement of conflict situations in court and various instances.
profile_positions.title: Junior Lawyer
Legal Department Specialist
